questions.question: How can parallel data be taken out of a shift register simultaneously?

answers.a: Use the Q output of the first FF
answers.b: Use the Q output of the last FF
answers.c: Tie all of the Q outputs together
answers.d: Use the Q output of each FF

questions.question: What does the output enable do on the 74395A chip?

answers.a: It determines when data can be loaded.
answers.b: It forces all outputs to go HIGH
answers.c: It forces all outputs to go LOW.

questions.question: To operate correctly, starting a ring shift counter requires:

answers.b: presetting one flip-flop and clearing all others
answers.c: clearing one flip-flop and presetting all others
